(촀\0I've yet to catch anything!
(촀\0Do you think I need to try matching

bugs even breathe like we do?

(%촀\0Not knowing what you'll reel in until

\0 (촀\0is part of what makes

\0 n\0.

(%촀\0If you take good care of them,
\0
(촀\0flowers reward you with blooms.\0\0(4촀\0They can't talk to us in words,
\0
(촀\0but I feel like our hearts can

(1촀\0Someday,
\0 I hope to share an

\0
while rain falls all around us
